title: CoroCoro Splat Roller
paragraphs: The CoroCoro Splat Roller is a main weapon in Splatoon. It is a CoroCoro-branded variant of the Splat Roller.

The CoroCoro Splat Roller shares its overall design with the Splat Roller. However, the strip across the ink tank is white, the metal handle is dark blue with black grips, and there is an extra silver-gray attachment on the right side of the roller. The CoroCoro logo is also debossed into the actual roller, alongside a CoroCoro decal on the weapon's ink tank and a decal of its dragon mascot on the side of the roller part.

The CoroCoro Splat Roller was first announced in CoroCoro Comic,[1] which also revealed the CoroCoro Cap and the CoroCoro Hoodie. It was one of eight weapons included in Sheldon's Picks Vol. 2 and was released on 8 June 2016 at 02:00 UTC.[2]
The CoroCoro Splat Roller comes with Splash Walls and the Inkzooka.

CoroCoro Splat Roller is a combination of Splat and Roller plus the brand CoroCoro, a Japanese manga magazine.
